import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk set room assignments for users"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/rooms/set"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sets room assignments for multiple users at once. Use this to align staff or students with physical rooms and keep location metadata consistent.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserIds** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to gather `Items[].UserId` values.
2. **LocationId/Room** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2) to obtain LocationId values and valid room names.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for users and collect UserIds.
2. Build an array of `SetUserLocationRequest` objects with UserId and Rooms.
3. POST this endpoint to apply room assignments.

**Minimal Required Fields**: For each entry, UserId plus Rooms (and optionally LocationId).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Location and room update payload used by bulk set-location operations. Mirrors `Spark.Shared.Models.Requests.SetUserLocationRequest`.","properties":{"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier. This field is ignored when used inside a bulk wrapper that provides `UserIds`/`IsSelectAll`."},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"New primary location identifier. Set to null to unset the location (when permitted)."},"IsLocked":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, locks the user's location from further automated changes."},"Rooms":{"type":"array","description":"Rooms to assign to the user.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Room assignment entry used when setting a user's location. Mirrors `SetUserLocationRequestRoom`.","properties":{"CreateRoomIfNotExists":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, creates the room record if it does not already exist."},"Room":{"description":"Room details.","allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"A room within a location. Rooms represent specific spaces (classrooms, offices, labs, etc.) that can be assigned to tickets, assets, or reserved for events.","properties":{"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Unique identifier for the room. Null when creating a new room."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site/district this room belongs to"},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent location (building/school) containing this room"},"LocationName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display name of the parent lead time required before reserving this room"},"LeadTimeThresholdUnit":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Unit for lead time threshold","enum":["Hours","Days","Weeks"]},"LocationRoomAvailableTimes":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines a room's availability window for a specific day of the week","properties":{"LocationRoomAvailableTimeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this availability record"},"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the parent room"},"Weekday":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"maximum":6,"description":"Day of the week (0=Sunday, 1=Monday, ..., 6=Saturday)"},"WeekdayName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Human-readable day name (e.g., 'Monday')"},"IsClosed":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is closed/unavailable on this day"},"LocalStartTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Start time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss format)","example":"08:00:00"},"LocalEndTime":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"End time of availability window in local time (HH:mm:ss when this record was last modified"}},"required":["LocationRoomAvailableTimeId","LocationRoomId","Weekday","IsClosed","IsDeleted","CreatedDate","ModifiedDate"],"title":"LocationRoomAvailableTime"},"description":"Weekly availability schedule for the room"},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value assigned to a location room. >
  
</RequestSchema>
